items: Increase your Constitution or Intelligence score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

Cuando tienes éxito en tres tiradas de salvación de muerte, recuperas 1 punto de vida y estás consciente. También obtienes los beneficios de la acción de esquivar hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno.

When you fail a death saving throw, you can choose to reroll the saving throw. You must use the new roll. You must use the new roll. Once you use this feature you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Inspiring Musician
entries: Even the music you play hums the tune of enchantments. You gain the following benefits:

items: Increase your Dexterity or Charisma score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You gain the proficiency in the {@skill Performance} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
Your legs and wings count as musical instruments. When you make an ability check to play music with them, you are considered proficient with them.

You can spend 10 minutes playing a mystical tune for your companions, bolstering their morale for the next fight. When you do so, choose up to six friendly creatures (which can include yourself) within 30 feet of you who can see or hear you. Once until it finishes a short or long rest, when the creature makes an attack roll, ability check or saving throw, it can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to the roll. A creature can't benefit from this feat again until it has finished a short or long rest.

feat.name: Mark of the Wurm
entries: You have been touched by the dark god itself, giving you the ability to cast more of its destructive magic.

items: You learn the {@spell toll the dead|xge} spell and can cast it at will.

You also learn {@spell bane|phb} and {@spell ray of enfeeblement|phb}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast those two spells in this way when you finish a long rest.
Charisma is your spellcasting ability for all three spells.

feat.name: Master Waxcrafter
entries: Los Bumbles son maestros en esculpir y utilizar la cera de todas las formas posibles. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Strength, Constitution or Charisma score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

Ganas competencia con el {@item Forgery kit|phb}. Cada vez que terminas un descanso corto o largo, ganas 1 trozo de cera. Puedes crear más terrones de cera gastando 1 gp y 1 hora de trabajo ininterrumpido.

Additionally, you can use 1 clump of wax and apply it to yourself or another creature. As an action you can apply the wax to one creature of your choice upon which the wax is consumed. The creature gains resistance to cold and lightning damage for one hour.

feat.name: Mind's Eye
entries: Tus poderes psiónicos son cada vez más fuertes a medida que tu mente se expande. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Dexterity, Intelligence or Wisdom score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
When you cast the {@spell mage hand} cantrip using your Psionic Power trait, the hand is invisible.

Obtienes competencia en la habilidad Sabiduría ({@skill Insight}), lo que significa que tu bonificación de competencia se duplica para cualquier chequeo de habilidad que hagas con ella. Si aún no eres competente en la habilidad Sabiduría (perspicacia), ganas competencia con ella. Si la habilidad ya se beneficia de una característica, como Pericia, que duplica tu bonificación de competencia, tu bonificación de competencia sólo se duplica una vez.
The spells you cast through your Psionic Power trait requires no verbal or somatic components.

feat.name: Mystic Evasion
entries: The glimmering veil of the Flittermarsh quickens your flight and misdirects attackers. You gain the following benefits:

items: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, up to a maximum of 20
Ganas ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra la caída {@condition prone} mientras vuelas.

When a creature you can see hits you with a ranged attack while flying, you can use your reaction to gain a bonus to AC against that attack, potentially it to miss you. The bonus is equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You can't use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.
Increase your Dexterity, Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Survival} skill. If you already proficient in the skill, you double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell hunter's mark} spell. You can cast it a number of times equal to your Proficiency bonus without expending a spell slot and reagin all expanded uses after you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Reach
entries: Eres impresionantemente largo de piernas. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, up to a maximum of 20
Cuando realizas un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en tu turno, tu alcance es 5 pies mayor de lo normal.

feat.name: Royal Authority
entries: Eres un líder por naturaleza y tu voz y estatura lo dejan claro para todos. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Dexterity, Wisdom or Charisma score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
Your proficiency bonus is double for any check you make with the Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) skill.

As an action, you can let your voice boon to confirm your superiority. Each creature of your choice within 30 ft. of you has to make a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier). On a failed save, a creature becomes {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. If the {@condition frightened} target takes any damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. You can't use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Shining Star
entries: Tu intuición siempre te lleva a salvo de vuelta a casa. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Wisdom score by 1, upm to a maximum of 20.
Viajar a paso rápido no impone la penalización normal de -5 a tu puntuación de Sabiduría pasiva ({@skill Perception}).

You can create a guiding light that leads you to your destination. If you concentrate on a location you have been to on the same plane of existence, you can create a floating globe of light that leads you along the most direct physical path to the specified location. The light can't lead you to a destination on another plane of existence, a destination that moves, or a destination you haven't personally been at. You have to concentrate on the light as if it were a spell and it vanishes after 1 day or if you loose concentration. You can't use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Spellweaver
entries: Further delving into your aberrant heritage, you have grown in your mastery of their alien magic. You gain the following benefits:

items: Increase your Charisma score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
Puedes utilizar tus piernas para realizar los componentes somáticos de un hechizo. Si eres {@condition restrained} no puedes usar esta característica
Aprendes 1 Cantrip de la lista de hechizos del Brujo. El carisma es tu habilidad de lanzamiento para este hechizo.
You know the {@spell web} spell and Charisma is your spellcasting modifier for it. Once you cast this spell through this feature, you need to finish a long rest before you can do so again.

feat.name: Teamwork
entries: Destacas por echar una mano a tus aliados. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Strength, Constitution or Intelligence score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
When a creature within 5 feet of you has to make a saving throw, you can use your reaction to grant them the benefits of the {@action help} action on that roll.
When you use the {@action help} action to aid a creature with an ability check or attack role, they can add a {@dice d4} to the roll.

feat.name: Terminal Velocity
entries: Tu velocidad de vuelo y tu ferocidad con el aguijón no tienen parangón. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Strength, Dexterity or Charisma score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
Tu velocidad de vuelo aumenta a 20 pies, o 40 pies si eres de 5º nivel o superior.

Immediately after you use the {@action Dash} action on your turn while flying and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your stinger as a bonus action. When you make an attack in this way, you can add your Proficiency bonus to the damage dealt.

feat.name: Trampling Charge
entries: Your mighty horn grows even larger, making a stab with it extremely dangerous for anyone on the other side of its pointy end. You gain the following benefits:

items: Increase your Strength score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

When you hit a creature that is not more than one size larger than you with the attack from your Goring Rush trait, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition prone}.
Your horn attacks deal double damage to objects and structures.

feat.name: Vicious Feast
entries: Disfrutas del sabor de la batalla. Obtienes los siguientes beneficios:

items: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed strike with your {@action Bite|Necrite|PGtI} attack or reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can spend one Hit Dice to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitution modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

feat.name: Winged
entries: Te brotan alas translúcidas. Con tus alas, tienes una velocidad de vuelo de 6 metros si no llevas armadura pesada.
